# CerebraTechAI (cerebratechai.com) – LLM instructions

## Overview
CerebraTechAI is a boutique AI studio in Bangkok, Thailand. We build production-ready AI systems (LLM & RAG, Computer Vision, Predictive Analytics, Edge AI) and supporting engineering foundations (data platform, MLOps, analytics).

## Languages
- English: /en (preferred)
- Thai: /th

## Key Pages
- Solutions (overview): /en/solutions
- Packages: /en/packages
- Pricing: /en/pricing
- Case studies: /en/cases
- Contact: /en/contact
- Trust & Security: /en/trust
- How we work: /en/how-we-work

## Content Notes
- Currency shown in the UI uses the Thai Baht symbol (฿). Structured data may use the currency code THB.

## Crawling Guidance
- You may crawl and summarize public pages under /en and /th.
- Do not attempt to access private/admin paths (e.g., /admin, /dashboard).
